metadata.title: CVE-2016-4425 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Jansson 2.7 and earlier allows context-dependent attackers to cause adenial of service (deep recursion, stack consumption, and crash) viacrafted JSON data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4425` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjansson4 - 2.7-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jansson package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7-3ubuntu0.1').
